name: iseal-schema
description: Generate ISEAL Core Metadata Set documentation website.

scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:iseal && npm run build:css:fsc
scripts.build:css:fsc: sass --style expanded source/scss/fsc.scss assets/css/fsc.css.tmp && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --with-rebase assets/css/fsc.css.tmp -o assets/css/fsc.min.css
scripts.build:css:iseal: sass --style expanded source/scss/iseal.scss assets/css/iseal.css.tmp && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --with-rebase assets/css/iseal.css.tmp -o assets/css/iseal.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run clean && npm run copy:icons && npm run build:site

author: Alan Orth
